name: Prey Invasion
description:
Prey Invasion is NOT a port. It's an ALL-NEW adventure starring Tommy Hawk, a modern-day Cherokee warrior who can tap into his unique native powers, such as spirit walking and shooting his powerful spirit bow.

WHAT THE WORLD'S SAYING:

"The tap-to-shoot mechanic is excellent…This is good-looking, cheap, alien-killing fun." – IGN.com

"I enjoyed it immensely... I’d be hard pressed to say there’s anything comparable to it in the App store right now." – TouchMyApps.com GRAB IT Award
